The following poems are scored for music in the source text. Where poems are not stanzaic, no attempt has been made to reconstruct the metrical lines. Variations for different voices have been ignored. Repetition marks have been ignored.

To the right honourable Gilbert Lord Talbot, sonne and heire the right noble and puissant George Earle of Shrevvesbury, Washford and Waterford, Earle Marshall of England, Lord Talbot, Furniuall, Verdune, Louetoft, Strange of Blackmeere, one of her Maiesties most honourable priuie councel, Iustice of the forrestes and chases by north the riuer of Trent, and knight of the most honourable order of the garter. Nicholas Yonge vvisheth increase of honour, vvith all happinesse.
